translations: [数] 可实现的；可实行的；可感觉到的

sentences.sentence: In many cases this realizable wealth is not realized during the lifetime of the home owner.
sentences.translation: 在很多情况下，这种可变现的财富在房主一生中都没有成为现实。

sentences.sentence: In an email, Savage told me, "I have a pro-realizable-fantasy bias."
sentences.translation: 萨法吉在一封电子邮件里和我说：“我有一个偏见，就是可实现的幻想更重要。”

sentences.sentence: That is why thought reform is a considered a desirable and realizable goal.
sentences.translation: 这就是为什么思想的重塑被认为是一个值得和可以实现的目标。
